bwwExcerpt: When I panned Mamma Mia!, I lost a few friends. Maybe they'll come back when I say that I found On Your Feet!, the story of the Cuban-American pop star Gloria Estefan and her husband, Emilio Estefan, to be irresistible. With the recent closing of the Abba-fest, Broadway has needed a high-octane even...
showScoreExcerpt:
"I found 'On Your Feet!' to be irresistible. With the recent closing of the Abba-fest, Broadway has needed a high-octane evening to send audiences shuffling happily into the street…Even by the standards of Broadway musicals, its characters are one-dimensional. The music, which salsas through the Estefans’ catalogue of hits is too seldom shaped into the delirious climaxes the melodies seem to offer…The story…is not much more than serviceable."
